com.spacealarm
Class SpaceAlarmDatabase

java.lang.Object
  com.spacealarm.SpaceAlarmDatabase

public class SpaceAlarmDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

A database abstraction layer for the Space Alarm application. All CRUD SQL should be stored in this class.

Constructor Summary

          Instantiates a new space alarm database.
